#summary Overview of the UI

= Interface =

[http://codef00.com/ http://codef00.com/img/debugger.png]

The interface is broken down into 4 primary regions.

  * The [Disassembly Disassembly View]
  * The [Register Register View]
  * The [Stack Stack View]
  * The [Data Data Dump View]

Each of these can be dragged, docked, undocked, hidden and shown according to the users preferences and needs.
